section.name: Housekeeper
section.p: This project's goal is to provide a platform for managing all your household issues. You will be able to keep overview of how much you paid for food, what you have in stock, store your favourite recipes in a central place and get alarmed about nutritional values you are short of.
Please see the Roadmap for planned features.

section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: Housekeeper is compatible with every computer for which a Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is available. This includes computers running on Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP, Macintosh OS X, Linux or Solaris.
You can download a JRE for free here.
If your operating system is Macintosh OS X or Linux you probably already have such a JRE installed. Make sure your JRE's version is at least 1.4

ol.li: Decompress the ZIP or GZ archive to the location you want Housekeeper to be installed.
Start Housekeeper by double-clicking on "housekeeper.bat" when running on Windows or use "housekeeper.sh" on any other platform
